name: Joan Company

aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.description:
Hello! My name is Joan Company Pastor, and I am a passionate Frontend Web Developer from Alcudia, Mallorca.

I specialize in crafting high-quality, user-centric digital experiences, focusing on clean design, optimal performance, and seamless functionality. With a strong foundation in modern web technologies, I thrive on creating innovative solutions that enhance user engagement and satisfaction.

Beyond coding, I am committed to continuous learning, always staying ahead of industry trends and best practices. I believe in collaboration, effective communication, and delivering exceptional results that drive success for both clients and businesses.
